title: Armory: Drone Tank
description: Drone Tanks is a vehicle shooter with roguelike mechanics. You take control of a remotely operated tank, battling hordes of hostile humans, mechs, drones, creatures, and even gods. Your advantage? Technology â€“ and lots of it! Build your drone army and show them who's strongest!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Take control of your own Drone tank!
<!--text-->
Your tank your choice! Chose hull and turret of you liking before you go to battle! Find your ideal combination and show enemies what are you packing! Hull and turrets can be exchanged before battle, some combinations offer more powerfull assembled versions, but these always comes with come downsides.

<!--image-->
![Armory: Drone Tank-k68qy](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/3f36cddc373248019ba10ba9b9a12505/armory-drone-tank-k68qy.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Roguelike vehicle shooter where you build your army of drones!
<!--text-->
Roguelike mechanics ensures that no battle is the same. Defeat enemies get Battle data and exchange them for upgrades or drones to assist you in battle. Shop opens every 2 minutes and after defeating boss. 
Hostiles grows stronger each minute so you must aswell. each 10 minutes powerfull boss spawns you must defeat it in order to continue battle. Final boss spawns at 30 minute, defeat him to win battle.

<!--image-->
![Armory: Drone Tank-1svln](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/3f36cddc373248019ba10ba9b9a12505/armory-drone-tank-1svln.png)

<!--image-->
![Armory: Drone Tank-npp27](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/3f36cddc373248019ba10ba9b9a12505/armory-drone-tank-npp27.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# 3 (4) Viewing modes!
<!--text-->
Apart from standard third person and First person from both primary and secondary armament you can utilize your Observer drone! This drone follows you into battle and you can switch to view mode from its onboard camera. This is very usefull vhen locating enemies or controlling rockets. In case your turret dont have secondary armament Observer will come in with his own rockets

<!--image-->
![Armory: Drone Tank-o68pm](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/3f36cddc373248019ba10ba9b9a12505/armory-drone-tank-o68pm.png)

<!--image-->
![Armory: Drone Tank-k6dqd](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/3f36cddc373248019ba10ba9b9a12505/armory-drone-tank-k6dqd.png)

<!--image-->
![Armory: Drone Tank-1qmg6](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/3f36cddc373248019ba10ba9b9a12505/armory-drone-tank-1qmg6.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Destructible Structures
<!--text-->
Lot of structures can be destroyed to some degree. Drive over them or buy dozer blade from shop to plow through them. In case you get stuck you always have high suspension terrain clearance mode which raises your vehicle and helps you get over difficult terrain at cost of speed

<!--image-->
![Armory: Drone Tank-12jj8](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/3f36cddc373248019ba10ba9b9a12505/armory-drone-tank-12jj8.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Special skills
<!--text-->
You can chose from temporary boosts to help you defeat enemies or fire support might it be artillery, gunship, strike plane or tactical bomber but these come with much longer cooldowns.

<!--image-->
![Armory: Drone Tank-1gpl8](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/3f36cddc373248019ba10ba9b9a12505/armory-drone-tank-1gpl8.png)
